q: When and where will Invictus'26 take place?
a: Invictus will take place from 9th to 11th February 2026 at Delhi Technological University, Bawana, New Delhi.

q: What's in store for me at Invictus'26?
a: Exciting hackathons, illuminating workshops and seminars with industry professionals await you at Invictus'26!

q: Who can participate in events at Invictus'26?
a: College students from all over India with a valid student ID-card can participate in Invictus'26.

q: Where can I find out more about Invictus'26?
a: You can find out more and stay updated on our website and join our group for more updates

q: Where can I register for events for Invictus'26?
a: You will be able to register on Unstop and see your team status on our website as well in your Dashboard! Registrations starts soon.

q: Where can I see the list of events and their corresponding locations?
a: You can track events and their locations on the map LIVE on the Invictus website when the techfest begins!
